abstract: Facebook Connect can help nascent Web services recruit a healthy crowd of users in a hurry, and help the users find their friends on those sites.
snippet: Facebook Connect can help nascent Web services recruit a healthy crowd of users in a hurry, and help the users find their friends on those sites.
lead_paragraph: AUSTIN, Tex. — The only thing more challenging than deciphering the names of all the social-minded Web sites battling for attention at the South by Southwest technology conference here — Brizzly, Vicarious.ly, Stalqer, Quora and so forth — would be the chore of signing up for each one individually.

headline.main: Facebook Helps Social Start-Ups Gain Users
headline.print_headline: With Facebook Connect, a Leg Up in Attracting Users to New Social Web Sites
